page.title: 06The Avondown Estate.
page.content: {Avondown}has already been through 27 stages of building development and is still being expanded today.Majority of the houses on The Estate are semi-detached.There are 4 major roads on The Estate, Avondown,Glendale, Birchwood Drive and Riverway.The Estate takes its name from the{River {Avon}that flows at the back of Avondown.There are a few fields next to The Estate that have been used for grazing.There are future plans being made to use these fields for further housing development. On the corner of The Avondown Estate is a Vehicle Body Repair Works owned by Mr. Huxter.In the 50's and 60's the building was a Motorcycle Shop.Before that it was probably used as an Industrial Vehicle Rebuilders.
